section.title: Passive
section.sectiontitle: Use the passive if the person or thing affected by the action is the main focus. The 'doer' of the action is unknown or unimportant. You make the passive with be + past participle.
section.text1: People eat pizza all over the world.
section.text1a: Pizza is eaten all over the world.
section.sectiontitle2: Use by to include the person or thing that did the action.
section.text4: Bill Jones has bought the Goggle Company.
section.text4a: The Goggle Company has been bought by Bill Jones.
